smg.text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain at night. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
